remarks: Lemma for ~ aaliou .  An integer polynomial cannot inflate the denominator of a rational by more than its degree.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Nov-2014.)
statement:
aalioulem1.a $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` ZZ ) ) $.
aalioulem1.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. ZZ ) $.
aalioulem1.c $e |- ( ph -> Y e. NN ) $.
aalioulem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` ( X / Y ) ) x. ( Y ^ ( deg ` F ) ) ) e. ZZ ) $.
